vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Gen.46.12;
son of: Perez (H6557);
brother of: Hamul (H2538); married to daughter_of_Machir (H4353I) and Abiah (H0029J);
father of: Ram (H7410), Jerahmeel (H3396), Caleb (H3612H), Segub (H7687H) and Ashhur (H0806)
Group of chets.ron (חֶצְרוֹן "Hezron" H2696H)
§ Hezronites = see Hezron "enclosed" or "division of song"
a descendant of Hezron
vocabInfos._es_Definition: (a)   descendiente de Hesrón, hijo de Rubén; (b)   descendiente de Hesrón, hijo de Fares; tribu de Judá
